snippet.title: Mafia Thief Announcement Trailer | Official
snippet.description:
Mafia Thief is coming 2023 to itch.io - stay tuned for more information

Mafia Thief is a third-person stealth game. Break in 6 unique missions into houses, mansions, a warehouse or a junkyard to steal more than 70 different items. Complete the missions and follow the story. Avoid security guards, residents and the police. Get ready for the hardest thief experience of the year!

Music by Fuzzeke
